name: Greenhaven Tiny Homes
description: Greenhaven Tiny Homes specializes in eco-friendly and sustainable tiny homes. The website is built using Webflow and features product pages, customer testimonials, and an easy-to-navigate layout. It includes CMS functionality to manage team members and house listings.

name: Horalux
description: Horalux is a luxury watch e-commerce website designed to provide an elegant and high-end shopping experience. The website includes CMS functionality for managing products, product information, checkout, and more.

name: Nidra
description: Nidra is a tech-health company launching an AI-integrated smart mattress and pillow set. The website focuses on showcasing the product's innovative features and includes detailed product information, customer reviews, and strategic CTA placements.

name: Opulent Seas
description: Opulent Seas is a luxury yacht charter service website that offers a seamless and elegant user experience. The website features yacht listings, booking contact forms, and an immersive gallery showcasing luxurious amenities.

name: Victory Solutions
description: Victory Solutions is my personal portfolio website, showcasing my web design and development projects. The website includes custom HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for unique interactions, such as a smooth scrolling experience and a local clock in the footer.
